AU.name: Mega Man™ 3
AU.description: The dastardly Dr. Wily has taken control of an off-shore oil rig, aiming to drill to the centre of the Earth to collect energy for his latest invention. Sounds like a recipe for disaster and only Mega Man can stop it! Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

AT.name: Mega Man™ 3
AT.description: Der böse Dr. Wily hat eine Ölplattform in seine Gewalt gebracht und will bis zum Erdmittelpunkt bohren, um sich dort Energie für seine neueste Erfindung zu verschaffen. Dieser Plan wird die Welt ins Chaos stürzen und nur Mega Man kann es verhindern! Unterstützt vom Roboterhund Rush und dem Cyber-Gehilfen Eddie musst du dir einen Weg durch Dr. Wilys teuflische Festung bahnen. Besiege verschiedene Superroboter und sammele ihre Waffen, bevor du auf den verrückten Wissenschaftler und seine ultimative Schöpfung triffst!

Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

BE.name: Mega Man™ 3
BE.description: L'infâme Dr Wily a pris le contrôle d'une plateforme pétrolière pour forer la croûte terrestre et exploiter l'énergie nécessaire à sa dernière invention. Le monde est au bord d'une catastrophe sans précédent, et seul Mega Man peut l'empêcher ! Traversez la forteresse périlleuse du Dr Wily avec l'aide de votre chien Rush et de votre robot Eddie, et triomphez des Maîtres Robots pour récupérer leurs armes avant de vous mesurer au savant fou et à sa création ultime !

CZ.name: Mega Man™ 3
CZ.description: The dastardly Dr. Wily has taken control of an off-shore oil rig, aiming to drill to the centre of the Earth to collect energy for his latest invention. Sounds like a recipe for disaster and only Mega Man can stop it! Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

IT.name: Mega Man™ 3
IT.description: L'ignobile Dr. Wily ha messo le mani su una piattaforma petrolifera al largo della costa e sta distruggendo la crosta terrestre a suon di trivella! Il suo piano è usare l'energia ricavata dal magma per alimentare la sua ultima invenzione. Solo Mega Man può salvare il mondo dalla catastrofe! Con l'aiuto cyber-canino di Rush e il supporto robotico di Eddie dovrai farti strada nella diabolica fortezza del Dr. Wily, sconfiggere i Robot Master e impadronirti delle loro armi prima di affrontare l'ultima mostruosità creata dal folle scienziato!

EE.name: Mega Man™ 3
EE.description: The dastardly Dr. Wily has taken control of an off-shore oil rig, aiming to drill to the centre of the Earth to collect energy for his latest invention. Sounds like a recipe for disaster and only Mega Man can stop it! Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

ES.name: Mega Man™ 3
ES.description: El ruin Dr. Wily se ha apoderado de una plataforma petrolífera en alta mar con la intención de perforar hasta llegar al centro de la Tierra. Allí espera encontrar una fuente de energía para su último invento. Se trata de un plan funesto que solo Mega Man podrá frenar. Con la ayuda del perro cibernético Rush y del ayudante robótico Eddie, ábrete paso a través de la siniestra fortaleza del Dr. Wily. Tendrás que librar batallas contra robots jefe y recoger armamento antes de enfrentarte al perturbado científico y a su última creación.

FR.name: Mega Man™ 3
FR.description: L'infâme Dr Wily a pris le contrôle d'une plateforme pétrolière pour forer la croûte terrestre et exploiter l'énergie nécessaire à sa dernière invention. Le monde est au bord d'une catastrophe sans précédent, et seul Mega Man peut l'empêcher ! Traversez la forteresse périlleuse du Dr Wily avec l'aide de votre chien Rush et de votre robot Eddie, et triomphez des Maîtres Robots pour récupérer leurs armes avant de vous mesurer au savant fou et à sa création ultime !

MT.name: Mega Man™ 3
MT.description: The dastardly Dr. Wily has taken control of an off-shore oil rig, aiming to drill to the centre of the Earth to collect energy for his latest invention. Sounds like a recipe for disaster and only Mega Man can stop it! Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

PT.name: Mega Man™ 3
PT.description: O maléfico Dr. Wily tomou o controlo de uma plataforma petrolífera, com o intuito de perfurar até ao centro da Terra e aí recolher a energia necessária para a sua última invenção. É uma calamidade à espera de acontecer e apenas Mega Man a poderá evitar! Assistido pelo seu cão cibernético Rush e pelo ajudante robótico Eddie, terás de avançar através da sinistra fortaleza de Dr. Wily, combatendo vários Robot Masters e recolhendo as suas armas antes de enfrentares o cientista louco e a sua mais recente criação!

NO.name: Mega Man™ 3
NO.description: The dastardly Dr. Wily has taken control of an off-shore oil rig, aiming to drill to the centre of the Earth to collect energy for his latest invention. Sounds like a recipe for disaster and only Mega Man can stop it! Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

PL.name: Mega Man™ 3
PL.description: The dastardly Dr. Wily has taken control of an off-shore oil rig, aiming to drill to the centre of the Earth to collect energy for his latest invention. Sounds like a recipe for disaster and only Mega Man can stop it! Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

NL.name: Mega Man™ 3
NL.description: De dekselse Dr. Wily heeft een booreiland veroverd en wil hiermee naar de kern van de aarde boren om energie buit te maken voor zijn nieuwste uitvinding. Dit kan natuurlijk alleen maar catastrofaal aflopen, dus aan Mega Man om dit plan een halt toe te roepen! Bijgestaan door robothond Rush en robothulpje Eddie moet je jezelf door Dr. Wily's gevaarlijke vesting loodsen. Vecht tegen verschillende Robot Masters, verzamel hun wapens, en ga uiteindelijk het gevecht aan met de kwaadaardige wetenschapper zelf en zijn ultieme creatie!

Assisted by cyber-canine Rush and robotic helper Eddie, you must progress through Dr. Wily's fiendish fortress, battling various Robot Masters and collecting their weapons before facing the mad scientist and his ultimate creation!

RU.name: Mega Man™ 3
RU.description: Подлый Dr. Wily захватил нефтедобывающую платформу в океане, намереваясь пробурить туннель до самого ядра Земли, чтобы добывать энергию для своего новейшего изобретения. Над миром в очередной раз дамокловым мечом нависла катастрофа, и только Mega Man в состоянии ее предотвратить. Вместе с верным киберпсом по кличке Rush и киберпомощником Eddie пройдите по зловещим коридорам крепости Dr. Wily, сражаясь с Robot Masters и присваивая себе их оружие! В самом финале вас ожидает схватка с безумным ученым и его ужасающим творением!
